channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Strike
item.description: On Friday, 17 November 2023, there could be service disruptions due a strike announced for that day.%0AThe strike will not affect the following essential services:%0A‚Ä¢ final exams for Bachelor‚Äôs and Master‚Äôs degrees, postgraduate schools and PhD programmes%0A‚Ä¢ urgent issuing of certificates (provided that the urgency is documented).%0A

item.title: Webinar on the Anastasis services: study method and computer aids ‚Äì Wednesday 29 November (9 am-1 pm)
item.description: We will explore some best practices that students can implement to take full advantage of the latest study strategies and information technologies at their disposal.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: International Welcome Desk
item.description: As part of our commitment to supporting our international student community, we are pleased to introduce our new dedicated service, the International Welcome Desk that will support international students in presence and through MS Teams.%0AAll available information at the page International Students Office - Welcome Desk.%0A

item.title: Call for the B2 First (FCE) exam on 12 + 15 December 2023 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the computer-based Cambridge assessment B2 First (FCE) exam scheduled on 12 + 15 December 2023.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Study visa
item.description: Non-EU students residing abroad are required to submit a pre-enrolment application on Universitaly website within 31 July 2023, under penalty of exclusion. After the validation of the pre-application, they have to apply for study visa at the diplomatic/consular Mission within 30 November 2023.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: BiblioDOC: improve your information skills!
item.description: You can follow BiblioDOC, an e-learning course for all students of the University of Milan, especially undergraduates who are writing their theses: it will help you to better cope with the drafting of reports, papers and your final dissertation.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
